attributes.action: Compel cyclists to obey road traffic laws
attributes.additional_details: With the dramatic increase in cycling, particularly in London, we believe that cyclists should now be compelled to obey road traffic laws for their own safety and that of other road users and pedestrians.

rejection.details: It is not clear whether the petition is calling for greater enforcement by the Government of the existing law, or for greater obedience of the law by cyclists (which shouldn't need stating).
